entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Port Perry
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:59 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Uxbridge 5:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -11.4°C

Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -14.0°C
Wind: WSW 21 km/h gust 46 km/h

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 70 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
